dct_title_s: Communicatio Maris Mediterranei et quod Mortuum dicunt cum Mari Rubro
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows drainage, vegetation, and sites of historical interest.
Sites lettered A to F on 2nd map; key is not present.
"Lib. II. de opificio globi terreni" and "Mundi subterranei" -- at head of each sheet.
